sentences: See on juba tehtud, kuidas ka tõestada.
Miks otsid sind ikka ja jälle?
Kui see ei tööta, siis peame tegema midagi mujad.
context: The word 'ongi' in Estonian is used to express emphasis or confirmation of a statement. It can mean 'indeed', 'in fact', or 'after all'. It's commonly used to add clarity or stress the truth of what has been said.
